nodes.html:
The Category Conversion Plugin for Revit is an indispensable tool for architects, engineers, and designers looking to streamline their project workflows. This powerful add-in allows users to easily change the categories of families within their Revit projects, providing a level of flexibility that enhances both the functionality and appearance of your designs.

KEY FEATURES:

Seamless Category Modification:

Instantly adjust the category of any family, allowing for custom behavior in views, schedules, tags, and exports

Enhanced Control:

Tailor how families are displayed and interact with other elements in your project, ensuring that your design intent is accurately represented

Time-Saving Efficiency:

Eliminate the need to recreate families or make extensive revisions; simply change the category to achieve the desired results

Improved Data Management:

Maintain organized and coherent data across your project, making it easier to generate accurate reports and documentation

WHY CHOOSE THE CATEGORY CONVERSION PLUGIN?

Up to 25% fewer errors in project documentation

The Category Conversion Plugin empowers you to take full control of your Revit families. Whether you need to adjust the appearance of elements in different views or ensure accurate scheduling, this tool provides the versatility and efficiency required for successful project delivery.

Transform your Revit experience with the Category Conversion Plugin, and enjoy the freedom to manage your families precisely as you need them.

frontmatter.title: Category Conversion: up to 25% fewer errors in project documentation

nodes.html:
The HoReCa Design Tool is an essential suite of add-ins for Autodesk Revit, specifically crafted to meet the unique demands of the hospitality and restaurant industries. This comprehensive toolkit includes an array of pre-configured families of objects, enabling designers to create intricate models of kitchens, storage cabinets, and various other elements with precision.

KEY FEATURES:

Ready-to-Use Components:

Access a vast library of components that adhere to industry standards, allowing for quick and efficient design

Exact Dimensions:

Work with accurate measurements to ensure that your designs fit perfectly within the intended spaces

Efficiency Boost:

Streamline your workflow by eliminating the need for manual modeling of common elements, freeing up time for creative design

Module Counting:

Easily calculate the number of modules or elements needed for your design, enhancing planning and execution

RESULTS

Cut design time by 30%

A restaurant design firm using our HoReCa Design Tools saw a 30% reduction in design time for each new project. Previously, they were using multiple software tools to create and customize designs for their clients, which slowed down the process. The HoReCa Design Tools streamlined everything into one easy-to-use plugin that automated repetitive tasks and accelerated the overall design process.

frontmatter.title: HoReCa Design tool: cut design time by 30%

nodes.html:
The Parameter Mapping/Conversion Tool for Revit is an essential solution designed specifically for foodservice equipment design projects. This powerful add-in ensures that your Revit families adhere to industry standards, providing a structured approach to parameter management.

KEY FEATURES:

Standardized Parameter Management:

Easily align your Revit family databases with established industry standards, ensuring compatibility across projects

Effortless Mapping and Conversion:

Automatically map parameters from one family type to another, simplifying the process of updating and maintaining your models

Enhanced Collaboration:

Facilitate teamwork by providing a common framework for parameter management, making it easier for all stakeholders to work together

Improved Accuracy:

Reduce errors in your designs by standardizing parameters, enhancing the quality of your Revit models

RESULTS:

Helps reduce error rates by 25%

A client (under NDA) reported a 25% reduction in errors after implementing our Parameter Mapping Plugin. Before using the plugin, their team was manually transferring parameters between families, which often resulted in data mismatches and rework. With Parameter Mapping, this task became automated, significantly improving the accuracy of data and reducing costly errors.

frontmatter.title: Parameter Mapping/Conversion helps reduce error rates by 25%

nodes.html:
Welcome to the future of data management in your Revit projects with our Parameters to/from Excel plugin. Designed for architects, engineers, and BIM professionals, this powerful tool streamlines the transfer of data between Revit and Excel, allowing you to manage your project parameters with unmatched ease.

KEY FEATURES:

Effortless Data Transfer:

Instantly import and export parameters between Revit and Excel, eliminating the need for manual entry and reducing the risk of errors

Simplified Parameter Management:

Easily update, modify, and synchronize parameters directly from Excel, making your data management process more intuitive and user-friendly

Enhanced Productivity:

Save valuable time during project setup and revisions by quickly adjusting parameters in bulk, allowing you to focus on design rather than data entry

Improved Accuracy:

Minimize mistakes with automated data transfers that ensure your Revit models are always up-to-date with the latest information from Excel

HOW IT WORKS:

  1. Connect: Install the plugin and connect your Revit project with your Excel spreadsheet.
  2. Transfer: Choose parameters to export to Excel or import from Excel with just a few clicks.
  3. Update: Make necessary adjustments in Excel, then seamlessly sync the changes back to Revit.
  4. Review: Enjoy a well-organized model with accurate parameters that reflect your latest design decisions.

The “Placer Marker” plugin for Revit is designed to enhance the efficiency and accuracy of placing markers within your Revit projects.

KEY FEATURES:

Easy Marker Placement:

Quickly add markers to your models with intuitive controls

Effortless Management:

Organize and manage your markers for streamlined navigation

Enhanced Documentation:

Ensure your projects are well-documented and easy to understand

RESULTS

Increases the efficiency and accuracy of marker placement by 25%

HOW IT WORKS?

  • Install the Plugin: Seamlessly integrate "Placer Marker" into your Revit environment
  • Add Markers: Use the simple interface to place markers exactly where needed
  • Manage Your Markers: Easily edit or remove markers as your project evolves

frontmatter.title: PlaceMarker: increases the efficiency and accuracy of marker placement by 25%

nodes.html:
Transform the way you work with Revit models! Our powerful plugin is designed specifically for professionals in the architecture, engineering, and construction industries. With a user-friendly interface and robust features, it enhances your productivity and safeguards your intellectual property.

KEY FEATURES:

Comprehensive Item Management

Effortlessly browse and manage a wide range of add-ins directly from the Revit Store. Our intuitive interface allows you to find the right tools quickly, streamlining your workflow

Purchase and License Verification

Stay compliant and organized! Our plugin automatically checks your licenses and purchases, ensuring you have access to the tools you need without any surprises

Seamless Family Downloads

No more hassle with family management. Download and insert families directly into your Revit projects with just a few clicks. Save time and focus on what really matters—your design

Protect Your Content with Watermarking

Your designs are valuable, and we help you protect them. Our built-in watermarking feature embeds your proprietary information into families, deterring unauthorized use and safeguarding your intellectual property

HOW IT WORKS

  1. Install the Plugin: Get started with a simple installation process.
  2. Browse the Store: Explore a curated selection of add-ins tailored for your needs.
  3. Check Licenses: Automatically verify your purchased licenses to ensure compliance.
  4. Download Families: Quickly download and insert families into your Revit projects.
  5. Embed Watermarks: Protect your content with custom watermarks that identify your work.

WHY CHOOSE US?

Cut work time by 40%

User-Centric Design: Our plugin is crafted with the user in mind, ensuring a seamless experience.

Time-Saving Solutions: Automate tedious tasks and focus more on your projects.

Enhanced Security: Protect your proprietary designs with our advanced watermarking feature.

Reliable Support: Our dedicated support team is here to assist you whenever you need help.

frontmatter.title: Store For Revit Models: сut work time by 40%

nodes.html:
The TagSolver plugin for Revit is designed to revolutionize how you manage tags in your projects. With its intelligent automation, TagSolver ensures that all tags are perfectly placed, evenly spaced, and free from overlap. This not only enhances the aesthetic quality of your drawings but also boosts the overall efficiency of your design workflow.

KEY FEATURES:

Automatic Tag Adjustment:

Say goodbye to manual adjustments! TagSolver automatically positions your tags, ensuring an organized layout

Even Spacing:

Maintain a consistent and professional appearance across all your drawings with evenly spaced tags that enhance readability

Overlap Prevention:

Eliminate the frustration of overlapping tags, allowing for clear communication of design intent

User-Friendly Interface:

Easily integrate TagSolver into your existing Revit setup with a simple and intuitive interface

  • The SpaceKey is usually shown in the URL when you are in a Confluence space.
  • If the key does not appear in the URL, you can find it by going to Space tools > Overview > Space details.

How TagSolver Helped:

  • Automated the tagging process, reducing human error
  • Increased project accuracy and consistency
  • Streamlined team collaboration with automatic tagging updates

RESULTS:

Cut work time by 40%

One of our clients(inpad.store) shared their results after implementing the TagSolver plugin. Prior to using this tool, they were spending countless hours manually organizing and tagging elements in Revit, which led to errors and project delays. However, after integrating TagSolver, they reported a 40% reduction in the time spent on tagging and organizing elements.

Ready to enhance your Revit experience? Contact us and transform your tagging process today!
